verses.content: LALPA chu inpâk ro, LALPA hming chu inpâk ro; Aw nangni LALPA siehlawhai, ama chu inpâk ro;
LALPA ina ngîr hlak a, Nangni ei Pathien in inhuonna sûng tuollaia ngîr hlakhai.
LALPA chu inpâk ro, LALPA chu a ṭha sih a, A hming inpâkin hla sak ro, ân hawi sih a.
LALPA chun Jakobhai hi ama ta dingin a thlang sih a, Israelhai hi a ro bik dingin a thlang bawk a.
LALPA chu ropuitak a nih ti le, Ei LALPA chu pathien po po nêkin a chunghnung a nih, ti ka hriet sih a.
LALPA chun a nuom taphawt chu a thaw hlak a, Vânahai, hnuoiahai, tuisuorietahai, tui inthûktak po pohaia khawm.
Ama chun sûmhai chu kâwlkila inthawkhai chun ân lâwntir hlak a, Kâwlinlep dâm ruo dingin a siem hlak, A sum ina inthawkhai chun thli a lâk suok hlak.
Ama chun Aigupta rama nau lutîrhai chu a sukhlum a, Mihriem le sahai khawm.
Aw Aigupta, ama chun inchiknahai le thilmakhai i chungah a hung tir a, Pharao chung le a siehlawhai po po chunga chun.
Ama chun hnam tamtak a sukhlum a, Lal ropuitak takhai a that a.
Amor mihai lal Sihon le, Basan ram lal Og le, Kanaana mi po po chu.
An ram chu rochan dingin a pêk a, A mi Israelhai rochan dingin.
Aw LALPA, i hming chu kumkhawtluongin um a ta, Aw LALPA, nangma hriet zingna chu suon um sûng po poin um bawk a tih.
LALPA, chun a mihai chu ro a rêlpêkin, A siehlawhai chungthua chun a lungril ân lêt ding a ni sih a.
Hnam tin milimhai chu tangka le rângkachak an na, Mihriem kutsuok an nih.
Bauhai an nei a, an ṭawng thei si nawh a, Mithai an nei a, an hmu thei si nawh a;
Nahai an nei a, an hriet thei si nawh a, An baua chun thuok hrim hrim a um bawk nawh.
Chuong siemtuhai chu chuong ang bawk chun um an ta, Anih, chuong ringtuhai po chu.
Aw Israel sûnghai, LALPA chu inpâk ro, Aw Aron sûnghai, LALPA chu inpâk ro.
Aw Levi sûnghai, LALPA chu inpâk ro, LALPA ṭituhai, LALPA chu inpâk ro.
LALPA chu Ziona inthawka inpâkin um raw se; Jerusalema um chu. LALPA chu inpâk ro.
